articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass rally took place at the Kim Il Sung Square Monday to respond to the letter of the employees of the Chollima Steel Complex and carry through the militant tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial.
					Attending the rally were Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Jung Rin, leading officials of ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations and others including over 100,000 citizens.
					
					Read out there was the letter of the complex employees addressed to the working people across the country.
					
					In December last year General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the Chollima Steel Complex to kindle the torch of a great revolutionary surge and put forward the workers in Kangson as the vanguard of grand advance for building a thriving nation.
					
					The workers in Kangson adopted a letter calling upon all the working people of the country to bring about a great surge by pooling their will and efforts. In the wake of it, the newspapers of the party, the army and the youth league made public a joint New Year editorial advancing the militant tasks to glorify this year as a year of new revolutionary upsurge.
					
					Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report at the rally.
					
					The reporter said that the idea consistent in the letter and the joint editorial is that the whole country and all the people should bring about a new revolutionary surge on all fronts of socialist construction in hearty response to the WPK's call as in the period of a great Chollima upsurge in the 1950s and thus open the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation in 2012 at any cost and demonstrate to the full the dignity and might of Songun Korea.
					
					The New Year Juche 98 (2009) is a year of epoch-making changes, in which noteworthy events will be recorded in the history of building a great prosperous and powerful, socialist nation, and a year of a new revolutionary surge, in which all the people should launch a general offensive to make a historic leap on all fronts, he said, urging all the officials, party members and working people in the city of Pyongyang to take the lead in the nationwide drive to make a new history of a great revolutionary surge in the 21st century.
					
					The reporter expressed the will to steadily adhere to the idea of "By our nation itself" under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, reunification programmes common to the nation, and smash every move of the separatist forces and accomplish the cause of national reunification without fail.
					
					He said: The victory is in store for us in the worthwhile struggle to effect a new revolutionary surge as long as there are the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il and the invincible military power, the infinite spiritual strength of our army and people and the inexhaustible potentials of the independent economy.
					
					Speeches were made at the rally by Jong Myong Su, manager of the East Pyongyang Thermal-power Plant, Kim Yong Bok, chairperson of the management board of the Mangyongdae Farm in Mangyongdae District, Ri Kun Chol, first secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the
						Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and Kim Jong Chol, a researcher of Kim Chaek University of Technology.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Here
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Here
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here on Monday by air.

articles.title: 2009 to Be Year of New Revolutionary Upsurge
articles.content:
2009 to Be Year of New Revolutionary Upsurge
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The hope-filled New Year has dawned in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea where the torch of the new revolutionary upsurge kindled by General Secretary Kim Jong Il is blazing across the country like a prairie fire.
					Now the Korean people are full of great enthusiasm to launch a general offensive dynamically, sounding the advance for opening the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation, united closely around the Workers' Party of Korea as at the time when the great Chollima upsurge was brought about in the post-war years.
					
					Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of a new revolutionary upsurge in Kangson on December 24 last year. It is a great event that will bring about a momentous turning point in the development of the WPK and the revolution as in December Juche 45 (1956) when President Kim Il Sung set the great Chollima Movement in motion.
					
					Herein lies the WPK's invariable will to build a powerful socialist country that ensures the eternal prosperity of the nation under the blue sky of the country highly dignified with Songun and hand it down to posterity by racing against the time in the spirit and the mettle of having overcome manifold difficulties and built on the war debris a strong country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence through a great Chollima upsurge.
					
					The Korean people will certainly build a great, prosperous and powerful nation in the socialist country, the greatest patriotic heritage of President Kim Il Sung, by giving full scope to the indomitable spiritual strength and using all the potentials that they have cultivated and built in the flames of Songun and thus making a giant leap forward on all fronts through the great revolutionary upsurge.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-Chongryon Campaign Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-Chongryon Campaign Flayed
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' tyrannical suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and arrest of members of its affiliated commercial associations are open political terrorism and unpardonable crime as such actions defame the sovereignty of the DPRK and the dignity of the Korean nation.
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					Last year the Japanese reactionaries more persistently pursued the hostile policy towards the DPRK than ever before, the commentary notes, stressing that their fascist suppression of Chongryon was a direct political provocation to the DPRK because it was perpetrated as an extension of the said hostile policy.
					
					Citing facts to prove that last year the Japanese reactionaries made desperate efforts to stifle Chongryon, a legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK, and its affiliated commercial associations, it says:
					
					The era changes and the history advances. But, Japan's hostile policy to stifle the DPRK remains unchanged, going to the extremes now.
					
					The suppression of Chongryon means violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK. If the Japanese reactionaries' anti-Chongryon moves are allowed, they may more arrogantly run amuck and mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK without hesitation in the end. Their hostile action towards the DPRK can never be overlooked, though it is trifle, but should be decisively frustrated.
					
					A good faith does not work on Japan. Exercise of strong sovereignty only can work on the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					The Korean people are keeping a sharp watch on their reckless moves against the DPRK and suppression of Chongryon, and will take merciless reprisal if they dare ignite a military provocation against the DPRK.

articles.title: Adherence to Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
articles.content:
Adherence to Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the milestone of Korea's independent reunification common to the nation as they call for reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					Rodong Sinmun today stresses this in a by-lined article.
					
					The only way for promoting the national reconciliation and unity and reunifying the country is to fully support and thoroughly implement the north-south joint declarations, which manifest the national independence, the principle for reunification of the country, and clarify the practical ways for solving the reunification problem independently by the concerted efforts of the Koreans and by the might of great national unity, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group is now getting evermore pronounced in its moves to obstruct the implementation of the above-said declarations while denying them.
					
					Denial of the north-south declarations is just denial of the reunification and the development of the north-south relations and to hinder their implementation is just a revelation of the design to block the national independent reunification and realize the criminal ambition for "unification by absorption" at any cost in cahoots with foreign forces.
					
					Any deviation from the historic inter-Korean declarations should never be tolerated.
					
					All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should hold higher the banner of "By our nation itself" to adhere to and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to the letter and turn out in the nationwide struggle to crush the treacherous and anti-reunification moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					The movement for national reunification will victoriously advance thanks to General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il, who brightly shows the road ahead of all Koreans struggling for the national reunification with his great Songun idea and leadership, and the united efforts of the nation that is making headway under the uplifted banner of the above declarations, great programmes for the independent reunification common to the nation.

articles.title: NA Criticized in S. Korea
articles.content:
NA Criticized in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- KBS of south Korea on Dec. 31 last year slammed the puppet National Assembly, saying that 77 percent of bills for weathering out the economic crisis and settling the problems concerning the people's livelihood failed to be passed through the NA until the end of the year as an agreement on them was not reached between the ruling and opposition parties.
					Especially, the Steering Committee and the Culture, Sports, Tourism, Broadcasting and Communications Committee of the NA are expected to be listed in the Guinness World Records book as they failed to pass through the NA even one bill, it ridiculed.
					
					It is hard to expect any more social development without political reforms, KBS said, contending that to this end such chronic and immoral actions as detraction and outrages taking place in the NA should be eradicated before anything else.
					
					It is needed to conduct a movement for punishing lawmakers ignoring the population, it added.

articles.title: Nepalese PM on Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Nepalese PM on Friendly Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- I am convinced that the friendly and cooperative relations between Nepal and the DPRK will grow stronger in the future, Pushpa Kamal Dahal, prime minister of Nepal, said when meeting with the DPRK ambassador to Nepal who paid a courtesy call on him on Jan. 1.
					He praised the proud successes achieved by the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK government and the Korean people in the politico-ideological field, anti-imperialist military front and the drive to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il last year.
					
					He stressed that Kim Jong Il is leading the Korean people's struggle to victory, smashing the imperialists' moves for aggression and blockade.

articles.title: Important Anniversaries of DPRK Celebrated
articles.content:
Important Anniversaries of DPRK Celebrated
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Ukraine, France and Democratic Congo between Dec. 20 and 24 last year to celebrate the 17th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					Speeches were made there.
					
					Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised Kim Jong Il as the great leader who is guiding the Korean people's efforts for building a great prosperous powerful nation to victory.
					
					He also said that Kim Jong Suk who made great contributions to building a new Korea and the army is a model that all the revolutionaries of the world should follow.
					
					Andre Aubry, delegate president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, noted with high appreciation that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK has achieved great successes in building a great prosperous powerful nation, smashing the imperialists' moves.
					
					Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo, said that the Korean people have made world-startling proud successes in all fields including politics, economy and culture despite the imperialists' evermore vicious moves against the DPRK. This would have been unthinkable without Kim Jong Il's distinguished Songun politics, he stressed.
					
					A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Ukraine.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia entrenamiento de artilleria en la Unidad no. 1489
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia entrenamiento de artilleria en la Unidad no. 1489
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio un ejercicio de canonazo en la Unidad No. 1489 subordinada a la Comandancia de Artilleria del EPC.
					Le acogieron en el terreno el comandante de Artilleria del EPC, coronel general Ri Jong Bu, y otros generales y comandantes de la Unidad.
					
					El Comandante Supremo hizo conocimiento del estado de cumplimiento de la mision de la unidad y vio desde el mirador un ejercicio del fuego de bateria luego de escuchar explicaciones sobre el plan de entrenamiento.
					
					Al ver el intrepido ejercicio de los militares del EPC armados firmemente con los autoctonos metodos de combate del PTC, se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos ellos se prepararon firmemente tanto en lo ideo-politico como en lo tecnico-militar con la capacidad de defender inexpugnablemente la patria socialista frustrando a tiempo cualquier invasion sorpresiva de los enemigos.
					
					Tras apreciar altamente los exitos de ejercicio, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para fortalecer el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					El EPC, magnifico heredero de las gloriosas tradiciones de lucha antijaponesa, se ha convertido en el ejercito fuerte en la idea y fe, que encarna el espiritu de defender al Lider a costa de la vida y de estallarse como balas y bombas para el como su inmutable conviccion, y se ha fortalecido como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dotadas de modernos medios de ataque y defensa, destaco.
					
					Continuo que gracias a este gran ejercito invencible forjado como acero en la ardua lucha de casi 80 anos, nuestra patria socialista es una fortaleza inexpugnable y sera cumplida sin falta nuestra causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se reunio con los militares participantes en el ejercicio estimulandoles cordialmente y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el general de ejercito del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, quien es primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Kim Myong Guk, y otros miembros de mando del EPC y los cuadros directivos civiles, incluyendo los del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Efectuado el mitin de capitalinos
articles.content:
Efectuado el mitin de capitalinos
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de los capitalinos en respuesta a la carta de los empleados del Complejo de Acero Chollima y para materializar cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas en el Editorial Conjunto del Ano Nuevo 98 (2009) de la Era Juche.
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop y Kim Jung Rin y los funcionarios directivos de los ministerios, organos centrales y organizaciones de masas, asi como mas de 100 mil ciudadanos.
					
					Ante todo, fue transmitida la carta enviada a los trabajadores de todo el pais por los empleados de esa empresa.
					
					Al dirigir sobre el terreno en diciembre del ano pasado el Complejo de Acero Chollima en Kangson, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il encendio la antorcha del gran auge revolucionario y puso la clase obrera local en la cabeza de la majestuosa marcha por la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Los obreros de Kangson enviaron a los trabajadores de todo el pais la carta llamandoles a levantarse con la unica alma y voluntad para dar pasos agigantados del gran auge.
					
					Poco despues, los organos del partido, el ejercito y la juventud publicaron el editorial conjunto que se presento las tareas combativas para resaltar 2009 como ano de un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					La carta de Kangson y el editorial conjunto estan penetrados por igual de la idea de que todo el pueblo del pais deben levantar, en respuesta al llamamiento del partido, un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario en todos los frentes de la construccion socialista como lo  hizo en el periodo del gran auge de Chollima en la decada de 1950 para abrir a toda costa de par en par la puerta a la gran potencia prospera hasta el ano 2012 y exaltar altamente de esta manera la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar), comenzo el orador.
					
					Ratifico que el Ano Nuevo 98 (2009) de la Era Juche debe ser un ano de grandes cambios, en que se registraran acontecimientos de especial importancia para la historia de construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista, y un ano de gran auge revolucionario en que deben lograrse saltos historicos en todos los frentes mediante la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo.
					
					Anadio que todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores de la ciudad de Pyongyang deben estar al frente de todo el pais en la creacion de la nueva historia del gran auge revolucionario del siglo 21.
					
					Subrayo que bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programas comunes de la nacion para la reunificacion, el pueblo coreano seguira materializando consecuentemente el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y cumplira sin falta la causa de reunificacion de la patria frustrando todas las maniobras de las fuerzas opositoras a esta causa.
					
					Enfatizo que por contar con la probada y diestra guia del Dirigente, la poderosa capacidad militar, el indoblegable espiritu de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo y la solida potencialidad de la economia independiente, es definitiva la victoria del pueblo coreano en la majestuosa lucha por producir un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.
					
					Le siguieron en usar la palabra el gerente de la Central Termoelectrica de Pyongyang Este, Jong Myong Su, la presidenta del Comite Administrativo de la Granja de Mangyongdae del municipio homonimo, Kim Yong Bok, el primer secretario del Comite de la Union de la Juventud en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Ri Kun Chol, y el investigador de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Kim Jong Chol.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena brutal represion anti-Chongryon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena brutal represion anti-Chongryon
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- La barbara represion y arresto, que cometen los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los miembros de las Sociedades de Comerciantes e Industriales adscritas a ella, devienen abierto terrorismo politico e imperdonable acto criminal que manchan la soberania de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la dignidad de la nacion coreana.
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 5 y continua:
					
					La represion fascista de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon significo la provocacion politica directa a la RPDC porque formo parte de la politica hostil a esta que el ano pasado se torno mas brutal que nunca.
					
					Hay de sobra los datos revelando que en el ano expirado, los reaccionarios japoneses maniobraron rechinando los dientes para eliminar esa legitima entidad de los ciudadanos de la RPDC en ultramar y dichas sociedades subordinadas.
					
					Aunque se ha cambiado la epoca y avanza la historia, la politica hostil de Japon para el aplastamiento a la RPDC sigue invariable llegando hoy al tope.
					
					Si se tolera tal campana represora de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon, ellos actuaran con mas arrogancia y, al fin y al cabo, no vacilaran en atacar primero a la RPDC.
					
					Por lo tanto, es imperioso frustrar tajantemente cualquier campana hostil a la RPDC, que lancen los reaccionarios japoneses, aunque fuera de poca importancia.
					
					Lo unico que vale en el trato con Japon no es la buena fe sino el estricto ejercicio de soberania.
					
					El pueblo coreano observa agudamente las imprudentes maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la RPDC y la Chongryon y tomara una implacable venganza contra ellos si se atreven a cometer una provocacion militar anticoreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere al jalon comun para la reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere al jalon comun para la reunificacion
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ATCC) -- La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre constituyen el jalon comun para lograr la reunificacion independiente del pais con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana.
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 5 y continua:
					
					Es preciso apoyar activamente y ejecutar estrictamente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur que aclararon el principio de reunificacion de la patria basada en la independencia nacional y el medio practico para solucionar de manera independiente el problema de la reunificacion con las fuerzas de la gran unidad nacional. He aqui el camino para fomentar la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y lograr la reintegracion de la patria.
					
					Ahora, recrudecen cada dia mas las maniobras de la banda de Lee Myung Bak que niega dichas declaraciones intercoreanas e impide su ejecucion.
					
					Negar estos documentos significa precisamente la negacion a la reunificacion y el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur y obstaculizar su ejecucion deviene la demostracion de su ambicion de impedir la reunificacion independiente de la nacion y realizar a toda costa la ambicion de la "reunificacion por absorcion" en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					No seran tolerados jamas el elemento ni acto tendente a desviarse de las historicas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, con la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" en alto, deben mantener y ejecutar estrictamente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha por destruir las maniobras antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de EE.UU. y la banda de Lee.
					
					El movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria saldra victorioso gracias a la gran idea y la  direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien  ilumina claramente el camino a seguir por todos los coreanos para la reunificacion de la patria, y a las fuerzas unidas de la nacion que marcha bajo la bandera de las declaraciones arriba mencionadas, gran programa comun de la nacion para la reunificacion independiente.
